Container.Name: plex-releases-summary
Container.Overview: Fetches recently added media from Plex via Tautulli and sends summaries to Discord. Configuration managed via config.yml file. Supports scheduled CRON execution or one-shot mode.
Container.Requires: Required: 1) Tautulli running, 2) Create config.yml in appdata from GitHub example (https://github.com/thomas-lg/plex-releases-summary/blob/main/configs/config.yml.example), 3) Configure Docker network access to Tautulli

Config.Name: AppData Config Path
Config.Description: Path containing config.yml (must be created before starting - see GitHub for example).

Config.Name: Tautulli API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Set here and use ${TAUTULLI_API_KEY} in config.yml, or hardcode in config.yml. Find in Tautulli: Settings > Web Interface > API

Config.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Config.Description: (Optional) Set here and use ${DISCORD_WEBHOOK_URL} in config.yml, hardcode in config.yml, or leave empty to disable. Get from: Discord Server Settings > Integrations > Webhooks

Config.Name: CRON Schedule
Config.Description: CRON schedule for automatic execution (e.g., '0 16 * * SUN' = every Sunday at 4 PM). Required for scheduled mode.

Config.Name: Run Once
Config.Description: Set to 'true' for one-shot execution (runs once and exits). Leave empty for scheduled mode.
